description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; in blue ink a bust-length image of a woman with a coat with a large collar and cuffs holding one hand to her chest and the other resting on an open book
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 3) / 8 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Eigendrucke. Universtählt | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.158
portfolio: From Plate 4 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Bird Girl (Sonia Gramatté), Plate 4 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
